name: RasAdventure DEMO
description:
RasAdventure is a game that I certainly made

Join Ras in the ultimate quest to buy a pie for Mister Mayor!

Unfortunately, Ras is Ras and everything goes wrong for him.

There are loud sounds, LGBTQ stuff and swears so if you hate that, then I highly recommend you play it anyways because the volume buttons exist, and the LGBT things are pretty subtle. You can also just ignore the swears.

Apparently, Mark has scarred people for life lmao

Ru G is a :nerd: mac user
